name: Space Fighters (itch) (RedstoneEngine)
description: Welcome Space Fighters to the Space Fighters Academy! Here you will be able to fight in multiplayer or single-player with controller support as you go through, shooting asteroids, enemies, and even a boss while you are trying to be be promoted over your other friends. Collect power-ups, points, and fuel as you fight your grueling way through. This is an early-access beta build with many more features to come. Be sure to visit my YouTube, Redstone Engine, and leave any constructive criticism and / or suggestions there. I thank you for reading this and hope you give it a try! Also, if I do spot any videos on YouTube with this game that has more than 1,000 views, I will discount this game for a limited 24 hours after the finding of that video. This money will primarily go towards the creation of more amazing games and I thank you for any contribution. A charity live stream may also be on the lookout on my channel at a later date.
